terrainr 0.2.1

Add a uniform buffer around a bounding box

Source: R/add_bbox_buffer.R
addbuff.Rd

[add_bbox_buffer] calculates the great circle distance both corners of your bounding box are from the centroid and extends those by a set distance. Due to using Haversine "great circle" distance, calculations will not be exact.

[set_bbox_side_length] is a thin wrapper around [add_bbox_buffer] which sets all sides of the bounding box to (approximately) a specified length.

add_bbox_buffer(bbox, distance, distance_unit = "meters", divisible = NULL)

set_bbox_side_length(bbox, distance, distance_unit = "meters")

Arguments

bbox

The original bounding box to add a buffer around. If not already a terrainr_bounding_box object, will be converted.
distance

The distance to add to the buffer.
distance_unit

The units of the distance to add to the buffer, passed to convert_distance.
divisible

Numeric: Extend the top right and bottom left corners so that each side is divisible by divisible. Leave set to NULL to not extend. This argument is in the same units as distance_unit.

Value

A [terrainr_bounding_box] object.

See also

Other utilities: calc_haversine_distance(), convert_distance(), deg_to_rad(), get_bbox_centroid(), get_bbox(), point_from_distance(), rad_to_deg()

Examples

add_bbox_buffer(
  list(
    c(lat = 44.04905, lng = -74.01188),
    c(lat = 44.17609, lng = -73.83493)
  ),
  10
)

#> An object of class "terrainr_bounding_box"
#> Slot "bl":
#> An object of class "terrainr_coordinate_pair"
#> Slot "lat":
#>      lat 
#> 44.04899 
#> 
#> Slot "lng":
#>       lng 
#> -74.01197 
#> 
#> 
#> Slot "tr":
#> An object of class "terrainr_coordinate_pair"
#> Slot "lat":
#>      lat 
#> 44.17615 
#> 
#> Slot "lng":
#>       lng 
#> -73.83484 
#> 
#> 
set_bbox_side_length(
  list(
    c(lat = 44.04905, lng = -74.01188),
    c(lat = 44.17609, lng = -73.83493)
  ),
  4000
)

#> An object of class "terrainr_bounding_box"
#> Slot "bl":
#> An object of class "terrainr_coordinate_pair"
#> Slot "lat":
#>      lat 
#> 44.09461 
#> 
#> Slot "lng":
#>       lng 
#> -73.94854 
#> 
#> 
#> Slot "tr":
#> An object of class "terrainr_coordinate_pair"
#> Slot "lat":
#>      lat 
#> 44.13059 
#> 
#> Slot "lng":
#>       lng 
#> -73.89844 
#> 
#>
